Footer.description: Professional event planning, exhibitions, and equipment rental services in Riyadh

HomePage.title: My App
HomePage.heroTitle: Your Perfect Partner for Event Planning in Riyadh
HomePage.heroSubtitle: We turn your dreams into reality with comprehensive professional event planning services
HomePage.aboutDescription: We have been providing event planning, exhibitions, and conference services in Riyadh for [X years of experience]. Our professional team of coordinators and designers has a proven track record of successful projects. We are committed to quality and creativity.
HomePage.testimonialsSubtitle: Trusted by hundreds of satisfied customers

eventPlanning.title: Event Planning
eventPlanning.description: Wedding parties, birthdays, graduations, and all special occasions
eventPlanning.intro: We provide comprehensive event planning services for all types of celebrations and occasions.

familyEvents.title: Family Events
familyEvents.description: Various family celebrations including engagements, baby showers, and anniversaries.

weddings.title: Wedding Parties
weddings.description: Complete coordination from start to finish
weddings.includes: Includes: Hall selection, decoration design, lighting and sound coordination, photography and video, food menu coordination

birthdays.title: Birthdays
birthdays.description: Organizing birthday parties for children and adults

graduations.title: Graduation Parties
graduations.description: Organizing graduation parties for universities and schools

eventPlanning.ctaSubtitle: Contact us today for a free consultation

exhibitions.title: Exhibitions & Conferences
exhibitions.subtitle: Professional organization and management of trade exhibitions, conferences, and corporate events in Riyadh
exhibitions.intro: We specialize in organizing professional exhibitions, conferences, and corporate events that leave a lasting impression. With extensive experience in managing large-scale events, we provide comprehensive services from initial planning to final execution, ensuring every detail is perfect.

tradeExhibitions.title: Trade Exhibitions
tradeExhibitions.description: We provide complete solutions for trade exhibitions, from selecting the perfect venue to managing exhibitors and ensuring smooth operations throughout the event. Our team handles all aspects of exhibition planning and execution.

conferences.title: Conferences
conferences.description: We organize scientific and professional conferences with meticulous attention to detail. From coordinating speakers to managing sessions and providing technical support, we ensure your conference runs flawlessly.

corporateEvents.title: Corporate Events
corporateEvents.description: We provide comprehensive corporate event planning services tailored to your business needs.

pastProjects.title: Our Recent Projects
pastProjects.subtitle: Explore some of our successful exhibitions and conferences

exhibitions.ctaTitle: Ready to Organize Your Next Event?
exhibitions.ctaSubtitle: Contact us today for a professional consultation

equipmentRental.title: Equipment & Supplies Rental
equipmentRental.description: Rental of tents, chairs, tables, and audio equipment
equipmentRental.intro1: Quality equipment is essential for successful events. We provide a comprehensive range of rental equipment and supplies to meet all your event needs. From elegant European tents to professional audio systems, we have everything required to make your event exceptional.
equipmentRental.intro2: All our equipment is modern, well-maintained, and available in various styles to match your event theme and budget. Our experienced team handles delivery, setup, and takedown, ensuring a hassle-free experience.
equipmentRental.categoriesSubtitle: Explore our wide range of rental equipment and supplies
equipmentRental.deliverySetupDesc: Professional delivery and installation of all equipment at your venue. Our experienced team ensures everything is set up correctly and safely.
equipmentRental.takedownPickupDesc: After your event, we handle complete dismantling and removal of all equipment, leaving your venue clean and tidy.
equipmentRental.support247Desc: Round-the-clock technical support during your event. If any issues arise, our team is just a phone call away.
equipmentRental.qualityGuaranteeDesc: All equipment is thoroughly inspected and cleaned before delivery. We guarantee the quality and functionality of every item.
equipmentRental.ctaSubtitle: Browse our complete equipment catalog and book today

tentRental.title: Tent Rental
tentRental.subtitle: Premium European and traditional tents for all occasions
tentRental.intro1: Tents provide the perfect solution for outdoor events, offering protection from weather elements while adding an elegant touch to your celebration. Whether you're planning a wedding, corporate event, or exhibition, our range of European and traditional tents caters to all needs and budgets.
tentRental.intro2: All our tents are constructed with high-quality materials, professionally installed, and can be customized with climate control, lighting, and decoration to create the perfect atmosphere for your event.
tentRental.europeanTentsSubtitle: Explore our premium selection of European-style tents
tentRental.traditionalTentsDesc: Our traditional tents bring authentic Arabian charm to your events. Perfect for cultural celebrations, heritage festivals, and traditional gatherings.
tentRental.pricingSubtitle: Compare our tent options and pricing ranges
tentRental.additionalServicesDesc: Complete tent rental packages include professional services:
tentRental.ctaTitle: Ready to Book Your Perfect Tent?
tentRental.ctaSubtitle: Contact us for a detailed quote tailored to your event

pyramid.title: Pyramid Tents
pyramid.description: Elegant pyramid-shaped design, perfect for luxury parties

pagoda.title: Pagoda Tents
pagoda.description: Small conical design, suitable for temporary offices

dome.title: Dome Tents
dome.description: Unique semi-spherical design, modern and luxurious appearance

clearSpan.title: Clear Span Tents
clearSpan.description: Transparent roof and walls, unique experience

labels.pricingNote: Note: Prices are estimates and may vary based on event duration, location, additional services, and customization requirements. Contact us for an accurate quote tailored to your needs.

furnitureRental.title: Furniture Rental
furnitureRental.subtitle: Elegant chairs and tables for all types of events
furnitureRental.intro1: Choosing the right furniture is essential for creating a comfortable and elegant atmosphere at your event. We offer a comprehensive selection of chairs and tables in various styles to match any theme or occasion.
furnitureRental.intro2: All our furniture is meticulously maintained, professionally cleaned, and available with matching linens and covers to complete your event's aesthetic.
furnitureRental.introTitle: The Perfect Seating for Your Event
furnitureRental.chairsSubtitle: From elegant Chiavari to practical plastic chairs, find the perfect seating
furnitureRental.tablesSubtitle: Round, rectangular, and cocktail tables in all sizes
furnitureRental.linensDesc: Add the finishing touches to your event with our selection of high-quality linens and covers:
furnitureRental.packagesDesc: Save money by renting furniture packages! We offer discounted rates for bulk orders and complete event setups.
furnitureRental.ctaSubtitle: Contact us for customized quotes and package deals

audioLighting.title: Audio & Lighting Rental
audioLighting.subtitle: Professional audio and lighting equipment for unforgettable events
audioLighting.intro1: Sound and lighting are crucial elements that can make or break an event. Professional audio ensures every word is heard clearly, while creative lighting sets the mood and enhances the visual appeal of your venue.
audioLighting.intro2: We provide state-of-the-art audio and lighting equipment operated by experienced technicians to ensure flawless execution. From intimate gatherings to large-scale concerts, we have the perfect solution for every event.
audioLighting.introTitle: The Power of Sound and Light
audioLighting.lightingSystemsSubtitle: Transform your venue with professional lighting
audioLighting.specialEffectsSubtitle: Add wow factor to your event with stunning special effects
audioLighting.ctaSubtitle: Contact us for professional audio and lighting solutions

QuoteRequest.title: Get a Custom Quote for Your Event
QuoteRequest.subtitle: We're here to help you plan your perfect event
QuoteRequest.formIntro: Fill out the form below and we'll contact you within 24 hours
QuoteRequest.contactInfo: You can also contact us directly:

errors.fullNameMin: Full name must be at least 2 characters
errors.phoneMin: Phone number must be at least 10 digits
errors.locationMin: Location must be at least 3 characters
errors.servicesRequired: Please select at least one service

QuoteRequest.notesPlaceholder: Share any additional details or special ideas for your event
QuoteRequest.success: Thank you! Your request has been received and we'll contact you soon.
QuoteRequest.error: An error occurred. Please try again.

Portfolio.title: Our Previous Projects

About.title: About Us
About.ourStoryText: We are a leading event planning company in Riyadh, dedicated to creating unforgettable experiences. With years of expertise in organizing weddings, corporate events, exhibitions, and conferences, we have built a reputation for excellence and attention to detail.
